Bash(powershell -Command "$timestamp = Get-Date -Format ''yyyyMMdd_HHmmss''; $excludeDirs = @(''node_modules'', ''.git'', ''dist''); Get-ChildItem -Recurse | Where-Object { $exclude = $false; foreach($dir in $excludeDirs) { if($_FullName -like ""*\$dir\*"" -or $_FullName -like ""*\$dir"") { $exclude = $true; break } }; -not $exclude } | Compress-Archive -DestinationPath ""C:\Users\Gabriel\Downloads\backup_agenciabase_$timestamp.zip"" -Force; Write-Host ""Backup criado: C:\Users\Gabriel\Downloads\backup_agenciabase_$timestamp.zip""")
